attributes.action: Remind men that Sodomy Laws and Unnatural Sex legislation is also used for the Protection of Women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Legislation enshrined in our Laws that is shamefully ignored, leaves vulnerable women to the Animal Instincts of Inhuman Men whom abuse instead of protecting them.
This law is not about practicing homosexuals but all men whom abuse a fellow Human Person.
